
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.

add_executable(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut)


target_link_libraries(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics
)

target_link_options(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)

target_sources(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/dataset_statistics/ut/histograms_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/dataset_statistics/ut/statistics_serialization_ut.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)


target_allocator(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

vcs_info(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut)
